May 26, 1928 D Scunthorpe Contest
Scunthorpe Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
scunthorpe-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
L'Ebreo [arr. Godfrey]
Brumby Hall Park, Scunthorpe Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £7, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest Call of the Road) - 1st(£2) Bullcroft Colliery, 2nd(£1) Bentley Colliery. Promoted by Scunthorpe British Legion Band. 8 bands competed.
